data.title: Rao Institute
data.meta_description: We provide and facilitate trainings, certifications and career opportunities within the railway sector.
data.text:
Embark on your Railway Career with Unparalleled Training

We at Rao Institute, develop, integrate, and streamline skills to enhance employment prospects within the railway sector, both in India and on a global scale

Our mission is to recognise employable railway sector skills, raise certification awareness, and facilitate certifications

148

22

Trained

Batches

Not just another certificate, diploma or degree. We train you to have skills that are needed in the job force right now in 2024!

Trained by industry experts. Focused classroom learning, practical hands-on lab sessions, site visits, and real-world industry exposure.

“I enjoyed this course. The course contents were precise and the trainer was very knowledgeable. I now have a clear understanding on railway signaling. I would like to say a big thank you to Rao Institute!”

Kondaveeti Sushmita

“I’m speechless! What I acquired from the training was more than what I expected! It gave me the confidence and skills that I needed to get into the industry. The training was innovative, informative, and instructive. Topics were taught practically which helped me visualised them.”

B. Murali Krishna

97%

Placed

97% of candidates trained offline by Rao Institute have successfully achieved placement in reputable companies.

Rao Institute leverages its wide-ranging railway network to connect you with industry leaders, opening doors to promising career opportunities.

Our alumni are employed by some of the world's leading railway companies.

80

IRSE licenses issued

15

MTM licenses issued

First and only IRSE approved agency in India!

We facilitate assessment processes for acquiring IRSE and MTM licenses, essential for employment in United Kingdom and Melbourne, Australia railway sector, respectively.
